website_summaries.verdict: An attractive, well-priced unit that's perfect for all your blending needs.
pros: Blender features a sturdy and easy to clean glass jar with a snug fitting lid
The jar is very durable and won't crack unexpectedly
The machine has a 700W motor and anti-slip pads to keep it in place when in use
cons: Like most blenders, it's fairly noisy
Blends better if ingredients are cut into small pieces

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: We received this blender in January 2018. Seemed to work fine for 3 mos and then just stopped completely.
customer_reviews.author: Diane & John

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a smoothie maker/blender and this fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smoothie maker/blender and this fit the bill. Crushes up ice cubes which many smoothie machines don't do well. Plus it is fairly light weight so I can lift it to my cabinet for storage.
customer_reviews.author: NativeTexan

customer_reviews.title: This would be a good blender if this issue didn’t happen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to blend bulletproof coffee. Coffee, butter, and heavy cream. Even with the lid completely on and the slots closed tightly, it splatters. I have to hold a paper towel over the lid to catch the splatter. This would be a good blender if this issue didn’t happen.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Monserrat

customer_reviews.title: A bit top heavy with the pitcher in place, make sure to wash the lid first after smoothies due to crevices.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a larger blender for smoothies and maybe some light processing duty in the kitchen. Does just that and doesn't take up too much space. Simple, powerful enough to handle what I've got to throw at it, and it hasn't shown any signs of distress.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Norris

customer_reviews.title: Stronger motor than most blenders, i recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I make my own basil, this is the basic reason i bought this. It works awesome! it came out so smooth and creamy with the normal pine nut lumps. Took less than a minute to smooth is down, my old one took 3 or more minutes. It does have a strong motor, better than most and that was the sell for me, for this very reason. I got what i wanted, at a price i could afford, loveit
customer_reviews.author: Bre Branco

customer_reviews.title: The blender has been working great so far
customer_reviews.text: The blender has been working great so far; no problems as of yet. The glass pitcher is heavy while the plastic bottom is a bit light so I hold it while blending for added security. I love the two openings that can be closed on the lid. That has kept me from making a real mess while pouring frozen margaritas!
customer_reviews.author: Alonso Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: They lied.
customer_reviews.text: They said it could pulverize ice. All I needed it to do was to make me a smoothie with chunks of frozen banana. It couldn't do that, (Yes, I gave it lots of time.) and I even tried to just give it COLD banana chunks and it didn't even pulverize them. I am so disappointed. My previous one I loved was a Black and Decker (I didn't have it seated just right and it burned off the gear) and I thought I could depend on the name and the description. Fooled me.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Smokes and doesn't blend well.
customer_reviews.text: We are returning this blender after a month of making morning smoothies. The motor smokes and smells bad. The food gets jammed and we have to take it off the base and shake it up. It takes forever to blend food up.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Party!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleasantly pleased with the quality of this and we put it through a hard test right out the gate — frozen margaritas. Worked beautifully and cleaned easily. Maybe I didn’t read closely but I expected the pitcher to be plastic. It’s glass which is even better. Great seal, looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Burned out
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: There is always a bad smell like it's running too hard even if I blend in 1-3 second increments. Recently, I tried blending a soup in it and had it running for 15 secs straight, but it stopped working and hasn't turned on since. * I love that it's easy to clean and that it crushes ice pretty well. The glass blender part is VERY bulky and heavy though so I knocked a star or that.
customer_reviews.author: Ikillgummybears

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This blender is soooo much better than the Breville blender I previously owned, and one third the cost! It is quiet, has a glass jar, lid is easy to put in and off, blade assembly comes apart for super easy cleaning, and it fits under the cabinets should you want to leave it out. I would certainly recommend this blender over more expensive brands/models. I mostly use it to make smoothies, but it is capable of doing other things.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: 1yr now smoking!
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this blender. Easy to clean & operate. Love heavy duty glass but light weight base. Loved using it to blend my BBQ sauces until today. Put my homemade BBQ sauce in to puree and made really weird grinding noise. Thought I hadn't put it on base correctly so realigned it. Pushed puree again & same weird noise but this time alot of smoke billowing out. Immediately unplugged it & outside cooling down before chucking it in the garbage. Won't be replacing it with same brand. I have a Cuisinart food processor that is 10+yrs old & never a problem so will look into their blenders.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy F.Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blender
customer_reviews.text: I have always like the black and decker brand. I was not disappointed. This blender thus far has performed extremely well. No issues, easy to clean, plenty of power, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Phil O.

customer_reviews.title: I like the glass better than plastic I have had with ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what is advertised. I like the glass better than plastic I have had with some blenders.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, I had baked pumpkin to attempt a pumpkin pie from scratch. The blender would not puree it. Turns out it wasn't a Baking Pumpkin after all...so it was not the fault of the blender. I have used it for smoothies and other things, since then. This blender is great! You will enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Jungenberg

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like it was a
customer_reviews.text: Item had stains in the glass and looked to be tampered with. Seemed like it was a return
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Blender
customer_reviews.text: Update...I do not use blenders to often. This one was used 6 to 12 times. Noticed within the 2 or 3 use that it was running hot. But thought, new and burning off stuff. Nope burnt out. Do not buy. They just don't make them like they use to.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Ince

customer_reviews.title: Smooth protein shakes
customer_reviews.text: For the price you cant beat this unit. This is replacing our much more expensive Nija Blender for less the a third the cost. If you want a smooth (not chunky) protein and ice shake, this is the unit!
customer_reviews.author: JSattmann

customer_reviews.title: This blender model apparently has significant motor and/or bearing problems.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, effective blender. Very easy to disassemble and clean. However, construction quality of motor and/or bearing is poor. This is the second time I've had this model start to smell and get very hot, even though I was very careful to follow the directions regarding cutting ingredients and regulating blend times. For example, run 30 seconds, wait 1 minute, run 30 seconds, wait another minute, run 30 seconds. During the 3rd cycle, the blender emitted strong "burning" odor. I cannot recommend this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Gib S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use my blender about 2 times a week for smoothies. I use frozen fruit and it blends it up great. It's easy to clean as well. I put everything in the dishwasher. Super easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of power.
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. Does not chop ice well at all. Ice gets stuck on the bottom under the blade. Not powerful enough to chop greens or frozen fruit. Bowl is glass which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jordana

customer_reviews.title: sound not loud like my old blender
customer_reviews.text: So strong ...sound not loud like my old blender, works great
customer_reviews.author: Temitope

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make smoothies and it didn’t disappoint! Makes great smoothies and cleans up in a snap!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender in January. Worked okay for 2 months. Noticed a leak from the bottom. When I investigated the leak, I saw that the plastic ring that holds the blade into the pitcher fell apart. It was never over tightened. I make a lot of bulletproof coffees with the blender. I am wondering if the coconut oil weakened the plastic until it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Reid

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I don't need to spend lots of money on a blender when I just want it for my smoothies. This is perfect, nothing fancy just an easy to use blender. AND it's RED, it's very difficult to find a red blender under $100.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: bought for xmas
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully mom will like, I think personally, it is a good and hard working product. She is in her 80's, I can just see her bitching about the heavyness. But I think the product deserves high stars. Maybe she will like? who knows?
customer_reviews.author: R. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Blender does not work at all do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender when my cuisinart of ten years stopped working. I’ve had this one just a few months to make smoothies, maybe a total use of 15 times. It won’t even blend frozen fruit with milk in it. I have to cut it all up so small and constantly stop it and stir the mixture. Shaking the container to get it to engage for a few seconds. I do not recommend this blender at all and I wish I had bought it somewhere like bed bath so I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this blender,eventhough it was not lining up properly when we used it for the first time. I used it twice within less than 2 months, but the bottom is damaged. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: C Ward

customer_reviews.title: Nice little blender
customer_reviews.text: Nice little blender for the price. Bought it primarily for crushing ice to make frozen cocktails, and it hasn't disappointed me. Looks nice too (in black).
customer_reviews.author: LB14Review

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: We have used it for several month. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Feng  Wang

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I wished the high speed setting was a little faster. But overall not a bad purchase over all. Feels heavy duty compared to some mixers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, cute color, does everything I need it to. I'm satisfied. (The glass pitcher itself weighs, like, 200 pounds, but, who cares.)
customer_reviews.author: michaeldj5

customer_reviews.title: Not good for soups or sauces
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this blender. Don't get me wrong - it's very attractive and is an overall "good" blender. But I specifically was looking for one to make sauces and soups. I looked through a lot of reviews, and this one seemed to be able to do that. Not the case at all. I was hoping to get rid of my old food processor, but I'll have to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S.

customer_reviews.title: Blender for Batter
customer_reviews.text: I am from southern part of India and most of the days we have dosa or its variant for breakfast. I was pretty happy that the blender was able to create a batter out of soaked rice and urad dal. Something to keep in mind, it is not good for creating spice powders.
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil Sreekumar

customer_reviews.title: Black and Decker does it again
customer_reviews.text: This is not an expensive blender but does not skimp on quality. Easy to use and clean. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: jl

customer_reviews.title: Bought Ninja Professional 72oz Countertop Blender and it is great. mixes and crashes everything from ice cubes to ...
customer_reviews.text: ok but not able to blend thoroughly. i returned it. Bought Ninja Professional 72oz Countertop Blender and it is great. mixes and crashes everything from ice cubes to frozen fruits.
customer_reviews.author: Katosel

customer_reviews.title: Average blender
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but not especially well. Tends to leak. Doesn't crush ice very well.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie LeBard

customer_reviews.title: Blender for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I read most of the reviews before purchasing so I was cautious of the burning smell that came with prolonged blending. I have not had any other problems with this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Lima

customer_reviews.title: Best blender I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best blender I have ever had . wish I would of purchased this before I bought my other blenders at our local store.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought as NEW, received as USED
customer_reviews.text: The blender that I bought NEW came with water spots and sticky stuff all over it like it had been used or returned and not washed. SO gross! Oh, and it also didn’t come with a lid!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: I have used it a few times and place the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used it a few times and place the food in as instructed. I have to use a spatula to move it around and then press blend several times. Not a heavily used kitchen tool, so it will be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E. Hixon

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest blender
customer_reviews.text: Meh..... Not to excited about this blender. You vae to be careful how you place the food items in it or it will not blend properly. I will keep it till it breaks. I like the red color.
customer_reviews.author: D. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: The glass was heavy to lift and one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The glass was heavy to lift and one of the buttons stop working the fourth time I used it. I returned it and got a complete refund. I'm going to buy one that is less heavy this time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it works perfectly and it's able to crush frozen fruits
customer_reviews.author: Pako

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, has some motor odor when working hard, not too easy to clean on the bottom, overall good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Snjezana T. Piric

customer_reviews.title: blades damaged by frozen fruit after handful of uses
customer_reviews.text: the blade got damaged from making smoothies (frozen fruit being the hardest ingredient) after about 5 uses. definitely going to seek a refund.
customer_reviews.author: A/M McE

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and thick glass. Easy pour top if needed. I just love this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Howdy Singapore

customer_reviews.title: Dont BUY this JUNK !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought this "JUNK" I made 4 smoothies !!!!! After that it dont work anymore.. :(
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dennert

customer_reviews.title: reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: this one is higher wattage than my old one (also black and decker) but does not seem to be as strong when grinding frozen fruit etc
customer_reviews.author: KLFC

customer_reviews.title: Struggles with frozen fruit
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the blender has a really hard time and needs to be stirred multiple times in order to crush frozen fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pillis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really love the design and red color , but doesn’t cut hard fruits properly for my smoothies
customer_reviews.author: MIN YAN

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to cream fresh soups and it really does the trick...I have not used it for anything else yet..It is easy to clean and looks sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Gray Whann

customer_reviews.title: Nice until the jar base split
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, out of nowhere, the plastic base to the glass jar split 😒.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, but not durable. Broke after 20th use
customer_reviews.text: It started out working well, but after a couple dozen uses it just stopped working and started to smell as if burnt. I suppose the electrical craftsmanship is not done to last a high number of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Does not blend well at all :/ Please do not waste your money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: k99

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: It broke the second time I tried using it, the only good thing was the glass pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: robin Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender, fast and looks great on my counter
customer_reviews.author: WomanwPurpose

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This blender broke all of a sudden after 4 months of not much use. It is a horrible investment. It was definitely built to break early on. Now I have to call the manufacturer to see if I can get my $$ back.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Rose

customer_reviews.title: Purées the competition
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my girlfriend to use to make smoothies. She loves it. My Only concern is the plastic drive train
customer_reviews.author: davisletch

customer_reviews.title: Smells like it’s burning up
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was good at first but runs very rough and often smells like the motor is burning up and I only use it to make shakes nothing heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: buy
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a couple months now and works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built item
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built item, but WILL NOT CRUSH ICE !! Mushes a small amount of ice at bottom but will not feed any more cubes downward to be crushed. Blades need to be much taller.
customer_reviews.author: BROOKE D.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 1 month 1 day
customer_reviews.text: The mixer stopped working in 1 month 1 day, and since it is 1 day over the one month return period, not sure what to do
customer_reviews.author: Samarth

customer_reviews.title: Lacks power.
customer_reviews.text: Not enough power. Barely spins a thin batter. Go for 750 watt or higher. Would not recommend purchase. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Peterson

customer_reviews.title: The motor couldn't handle to mix a soft fruit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it on February 14 2018 and it only lasted for one month before burning up!!!! I have been using it only to mix a kids protein powdered shake with a banana and cold milk And the motor burned anyway without using anything harder than the banana. Just terrible and a waste of money. I used to love the brand but now I'm in doubt if I bought an original black and Decker or a fake one.
customer_reviews.author: Kanan

customer_reviews.title: Piece of trash
customer_reviews.text: Burnt my table after 3 seconds of blending with lots of smoke coming from the motor. Don't fall for this scam and don't buy from this vendor. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blender. Surprised by the power for such a low cost
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, doesn't work well with dates in shakes, cut them to very big chunks
customer_reviews.author: Ran Michaeli

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a good product, ended up having to buy another blender
customer_reviews.author: erika

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It always smells like plastic is burning when i use it. I don't like that.
customer_reviews.author: Katja Trochocki

customer_reviews.title: Product Failed
customer_reviews.text: Used for Smoothies in morning only. Did not last long. Gears already stripped. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Creppon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. A bit hard to crush ice. Shame there is no safety lock
customer_reviews.author: Morgane

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product broke not even a month after my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Silva

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good blender, nice glass container
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I was expecting something of a lower quality. It's not. This is a really good blender, nice glass container, well fit shaft. Overall impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Icon Green

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to operate and keep clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very fast for making my protein shakes!!
customer_reviews.author: Marvin S.

customer_reviews.title: Blended Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a blender that could stand up to ice and meet my needs, this one does! I make a lot of creams, salsas, and base sauces. This blender helps make all of that happen! And it's in aan excellent price range
customer_reviews.author: Isaac A.H

customer_reviews.title: Blender broke 2 months after warranty expired
customer_reviews.text: Go figure. Spend a little more and live in peace.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Kessler

customer_reviews.title: so good. Sturdy and a nice glass blender
customer_reviews.text: Had a bit of trouble with simple ice cream at first, but eventually everything worked as it should have. So far, so good. Sturdy and a nice glass blender. Will have to try it with ice.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Szabo

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: It’s an okay blender. Does the trick but need something more watts.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Roberts

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T CRUSH ICE
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as being able to crush ice (which I wanted for frozen drinks). See the video for its actual "ice crushing" performance. It leaves the top ice largely uncrushed and turns the bottom ice into a frozen slurry that can only be removed with hot water. Hard pass.
customer_reviews.author: Thasha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' my new, quicker smoothie maker.
customer_reviews.text: Great blender! Love the color, and especially it's powerful blades. I use it mostly for smoothies and it does the job quicker and better than my old Magic Bullet. The reason I give it 4 stars is that I can't figure out how to take off the black bottom from the glass container when washing it - so it makes for a difficult dish washing process. Am i missing something?!
customer_reviews.author: Ofelia

customer_reviews.title: Made of great materials but blades need improving
customer_reviews.text: I like the materials it is made out of. Easy to put together. The gasket is permanently attached to the blade unit so it won’t get lost. I don’t like the blades. there are 2 shorter blades. My old black and decker blended better than this one. Always some chunks in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Marion J Tinney

customer_reviews.title: Strong Performance
customer_reviews.text: I saw a review of this Black and Decker blender on a cooking show last year, where the 2 chef's had 6 blenders lined up in a row and reviewed them. The Black and Decker out performed the other brands. The blender comes with a good quality glass jar and whips and blends everything smoothly. For the price, its amazingly efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Baazumi

customer_reviews.title: Cute little thing
customer_reviews.text: Cute good looking red on my white and red tile chicken, yeah the driver is made of plastic but the pitcher is made of glass, should last a few years depending in use, hey for $27 with amazon discount that I can spend easily for pizza can't really go wrong or ask for more unless you are a cheap dude LOL
customer_reviews.author: Jose Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Good looking.
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this product (especially considering that I know get a daily smoothie!). It does the job perfectly and is also able to crush ice (even if it takes a bit of time). And that look!
customer_reviews.author: Y. A-P.

customer_reviews.title: It makes my morning smoothie easy fast and simple just I expected this blender to ...
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you....this is one item I cannot do without...It makes my morning smoothie easy fast and simple just I expected this blender to operate. It have different speeds. It really makes my frozen fruits chopped up, blend up and smooth...which gives me a delicious smoothie or shakes. I highly recommend this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Angie

customer_reviews.title: I'd give it a 10, but the highest is a 5!!
customer_reviews.text: This blender works like a dream!!! I like how nice and easy it is to use. When it comes to cleaning, ot isn't so bad either! I recommend this blender if you want aomething both SIMPLE and CUTE/Durable!
customer_reviews.author: Jaliane

customer_reviews.title: The price is right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a vacation home. If you are going to use this on a daily basis, I recommend spending the money on a more sturdy blender... like a Breville. This blender is fine for occasional use. Do not buy if you are a chef and will use this often.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Antoinette Perrie

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves to make smoothies and always complains that ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to make smoothies and always complains that the ice gets stuck, but this seemed to do the trick and I haven’t heard him grumbling.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie N. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, powerful
customer_reviews.text: Simple, basic, sturdy, powerful, easy to use, easy to clean, excellent price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 5-yr-old B&D blender and this one fixes the problems I had with the previous one. I figure I'll go through an inexpensive blender every five years. The product keeps improving. I have an expensive Oster sitting in the attic. Dud. I'll stick with my B&D.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Schnell

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with it
customer_reviews.text: I just bought it and tried just once. Totally delighted with it. Compared to another one I have, much faster and quieter, easier and simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Upset buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this for smoothies, so far. I don't use ice cubes in my smoothies, so I can't say how well it would work for that, but I do use frozen bananas, and it handles them easily.
customer_reviews.author: Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Black and silver , black and decker nice!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother and she loves it so I'm going to give it a five star it runs pretty smooth not that loud wonderful design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Off switch didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I returned this and was refunded, but I think it’s important to tell everyone looking to purchase this that the off switch didn’t work. It turned on right when I plugged it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: 4 speeds not 10
customer_reviews.text: Be alert... The title states "10 speeds" but there are only 4. Low, High, Pulse Low, Pulse High. The jar is nice, large, heavy glass and is easy to clean. A decent simple to use blender for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This model works great after 13 months. Very convenient, and 700 watts more than competent in handling it's chores. At $35- a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Dixieland Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Good blender Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. Crushes ice well. Makes great smoothies and cocktails
customer_reviews.author: John Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the performance of the product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the performance of the product. Gets the job done. Highly recommend. I will buy the product and products listed by the seller. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Milinda Halahackone

customer_reviews.title: Bought in dec and not working
customer_reviews.text: The blender that I have only used a handful of times has already stopped working... I am not happy about this
customer_reviews.author: Be Nice

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER Countertop Blender with 6-Cup Glass Jar, 10-Speed Settings, Red, BL1210RG
product_meta.description: Color:RedThe BLACK+DECKER™ PowerCrush Multi-Function Blender uses 700W of power to pulverize ice and other tough ingredients to create delicious smoothies, shakes, and more. The QuadPro Blade is versatile enough to make iced drinks, soups, purees, and even crumbs (bread, cookie, or cereal) to use in other recipes. Use the intuitive four speed control buttons to find the perfect consistency. Then enjoy easy, spill-free pouring with the hinged recloseable pour spout and PerfectPour™ glass jar. Plus, cleanup is easy with the Easy Clean function that uses the motion of the blending blade to loosen caked-on food and all parts are dishwasher-safe. Fast and powerful blending, no-mess serving, and easy cleanup— BLACK+DECKER™ PowerCrush is the only blender you need. *Peak performance refers to the maximum power recorded for 100ms during blending.
feature_bullets: 6-Cup PerfectPour Glass Jar - The thick, sturdy glass jar has a classic feel with advanced performance, and the spout is molded for easy, spill-free pouring.
700 Watt Motor - The energetic motor delivers 700W at peak performance* to easily crush and blend an array of ingredients.

4-Tip QuadPro Blade Technology - The 4-tip stainless steel blending blade works with the shape of the jar to create a constant flow and vortex that leads ingredients directly to the blades for fast blending performance.
Dishwasher-Safe Parts - Cleanup is a breeze with the dishwasher-safe jar, blade, and lid.
Smoothies, Shakes, Iced Drinks, Purees, Crumbs, and More!
